name: Baklava
description: Media request management with admin approval workflow and enhanced search capabilities
overview: Adds media request system with user submissions and admin approval, smart search toggle between local and global sources, automatic TV client local search enforcement, and seamless Gelato integration for external content discovery

versions.changelog: Added option to disable requests for non-admin users (shows Import button instead)
Hotfix: Fixed request button states, removed sidebar menu duplication, prevented dropdown close on reject
Disabled modal popup when using local search mode - allows direct navigation to item details page
Added 'None' option for subtitle tracks, UI refresh after playback stops
Hotfix: Fixed carousel arrow positioning bug, restored filename display for version carousel, added Audio/Subtitle labels
Initial release: Media request system, search toggle with local/global modes, TV client auto-enforcement, server-side search filtering, responsive UI for all screen sizes, Gelato integration
